welcome_message_body: Welcome to beautiful Jeju, known for its stunning natural landscapes, including its famous volcanic landscapes, waterfalls, and beaches. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring this charming city and all it has to offer!

restaurants.name: Ujin Haejangguk (우진해장국)
restaurants.description: Ujin Haejangguk (우진해장국) is a korean restaurant located in 제주시.

restaurants.name: 정성듬뿍제주국
restaurants.description: 정성듬뿍제주국 is a seafood restaurant located in 제주시.

restaurants.name: 제주시 새우리
restaurants.description: 제주시 새우리 is a snack place located in 제주시.

restaurants.name: 교촌치킨
restaurants.description: 교촌치킨 is a fried chicken joint located in 제주시.

restaurants.name: 이꼬이&stay
restaurants.description: 이꼬이&stay is a japanese restaurant located in 제주시.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeju Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Jeju Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, no password required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeongseok Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
